content: {"name": "Morristown Meals on Wheels", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- The charge for their meals is very moderate\u2014 $7.25 per day \n- For those unable to afford the cost of the meals, Morristown Meals on Wheels provides a limited number of client subsidies. ", "email": "", "url": "https://morristownmeals-on-wheels.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "29 Elm Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Morristown", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07960", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7938304, "longitude": -74.47465799999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 532-2706", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
